comments:
To reproduce:

Start with build I20050509-2010
1. open a fresh workspace
2. create a hello world plugin (with OSGi bundle manifest)
3. in testing section of the new plugin's overview click launch an eclipse 
application
4. close the just launched eclipse
5. select your plugin from the package explorer and delete it


You should have 2 errors in the error log.  I came by this error doing the 
testing scenarios for PDE, it is actually fairly common throughout those 
scenarios.  See scenarios/steps D3.13 and D3.16 from 
http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/pde-ui-
home/scenarios/PDEScenarios3_0.html

The two errors are:
    Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.NullPointerException)
    Unhandled event loop exception

the NPE traces to:

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable 
(java.lang.NullPointerException)

Fixed.  We were trying to update the editor pages while the project is being 
deleted.  No point in doing that.
